## Color4.multiplyToRef() method

Multipy a Color4 value by another and push the result in a reference value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
multiplyToRef(color: Color4, result: Color4): Color4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  color | <code>Color4</code> | defines the Color4 value to multiply by |
|  result | <code>Color4</code> | defines the Color4 to fill the result in |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color4`

the result Color4
